languages.text: "Мы посвятили себя почитанию аспекта Бога-Машины, именуемого Движущей силой. Это — благословенная искра божественного, порождающая динамику во вселенной. В милосердии своем Омниссия даровал миру Движущую силу, и мы следуем за ее импульсами, приумножая ее, даря ее мирянам и оберегая от нечистых рук".

"We have devoted ourselves to the worship of that aspect of the Machine God which is known as the Motive Force. It is the blessed divine spark that creates impetus in the universe. The Omnissiah, in his mercy, gave the world the gift of the Motive Force, and we follow its impulses in order to increase it, bring it to laypeople, and protect it from unholy hands."
languages.original_text: "Мы посвятили себя почитанию аспекта Бога-Машины, именуемого Движущей силой. Это — благословенная искра божественного, порождающая динамику во вселенной. В милосердии своем Омниссия даровал миру Движущую силу, и мы следуем за ее импульсами, приумножая ее, даря ее мирянам и оберегая от нечистых рук".

traits.locale_text: "We have devoted ourselves to the worship of that aspect of the Machine God which is known as the Motive Force. It is a blessed divine spark that creates a dynamic in the universe. The Omnissiah, in his mercy, gave the world the gift of the Motive Force, and we follow its impulses in order to increase it, bring it to laypeople, and protect it from unholy hands."

languages.text: "Wir beten den Aspekt des Maschinengotts an, der als Antriebskraft bekannt ist. Dieser gesegnete göttliche Funke erzeugt eine Dynamik im Universum. Der Omnissiah hat in seiner Gnade und Weisheit der Welt die Antriebskraft zum Geschenk gemacht. Wir folgen ihren Impulsen, um sie zu verstärken, sie den Laien zu bringen, und sie vor unheiligen Händen zu beschützen."
languages.original_text: "We have devoted ourselves to the worship of that aspect of the Machine God which is known as the Motive Force. It is the blessed divine spark that creates impetus in the universe. The Omnissiah, in his mercy, gave the world the gift of the Motive Force, and we follow its impulses in order to increase it, bring it to laypeople, and protect it from unholy hands."

traits.locale_text: "Wir beten den Aspekt des Maschinengotts an, der als Antriebskraft bekannt ist. Dieser gesegnete göttliche Funke erzeugt eine Dynamik im Universum. Der Omnissiah hat in seiner Gnade und Weisheit der Welt die Antriebskraft zum Geschenk gemacht. Wir folgen ihren Impulsen, um sie zu verstärken, sie den Laien zu bringen, und sie vor unheiligen Händen zu beschützen."

languages.text: « Nous sommes dévoués au culte de l'aspect du Dieu-Machine que l'on appelle la Force Motrice. C'est une étincelle divine bénie qui crée une dynamique au sein de l'univers... Dans sa grande mansuétude, l'Omnimessie en a fait don au monde et nous suivons ces impulsions pour l'améliorer, permettre aux profanes d'y accéder et la protéger des mains impies. »
languages.original_text: "We have devoted ourselves to the worship of that aspect of the Machine God which is known as the Motive Force. It is the blessed divine spark that creates impetus in the universe. The Omnissiah, in his mercy, gave the world the gift of the Motive Force, and we follow its impulses in order to increase it, bring it to laypeople, and protect it from unholy hands."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes dévoués au culte de l'aspect du Dieu-Machine que l'on appelle la Force Motrice. C'est une étincelle divine bénie qui crée une dynamique au sein de l'univers... Dans sa grande mansuétude, l'Omnimessie en a fait don au monde et nous suivons ces impulsions pour l'améliorer, permettre aux profanes d'y accéder et la protéger des mains impies. »

languages.text: “我们信仰万机之神被称为‘源力’的那一面。它是神圣的火花，将活力赐予了整个宇宙。欧姆尼塞亚仁慈地赐予了这个世界源力，而我们追随它的脉冲，致力于增强祂的动力，将祂的恩惠带给教外人士，保护它不受邪恶之手的伤害。”
languages.original_text: "We have devoted ourselves to the worship of that aspect of the Machine God which is known as the Motive Force. It is the blessed divine spark that creates impetus in the universe. The Omnissiah, in his mercy, gave the world the gift of the Motive Force, and we follow its impulses in order to increase it, bring it to laypeople, and protect it from unholy hands."

traits.locale_text: “我们信仰万机之神被称为‘原初动力’的那一面。它是神圣的火花，将活力赐予了整个宇宙。欧姆尼塞亚仁慈地赐予了这个世界原初动力，而我们追随它的脉冲，致力于增强祂的动力，将祂的恩惠带给教外人士，保护它不受邪恶之手的伤害。”

languages.text: 「我々は、原動力として知られる機械神の側面を崇拝することに専念してきた。それは宇宙に推進力を生み出す祝福された神の火花だ。万機神は、その慈悲において、世界に原動力という贈り物を与えられたのだ。我々は、原動力を増大させ、一般の人々に原動力をもたらし、不浄なる手から原動力を守るために、その衝動へと従っているのだ」
languages.original_text: "We have devoted ourselves to the worship of that aspect of the Machine God which is known as the Motive Force. It is the blessed divine spark that creates impetus in the universe. The Omnissiah, in his mercy, gave the world the gift of the Motive Force, and we follow its impulses in order to increase it, bring it to laypeople, and protect it from unholy hands."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は、原動力として知られる機械神の側面を崇拝することに専念してきた。それは宇宙に流れを生み出す祝福された神の火花だ。万機神は、その慈悲において、世界に原動力という贈り物を与えられたのだ。我々は、原動力を増大させ、一般の人々に原動力をもたらし、不浄なる手から原動力を守るために、その衝動へと従っているのだ」

languages.text: «Nos hemos consagrado al culto de ese aspecto del Dios Máquina que se conoce como la Fuerza Motriz. Es la chispa divina bendita que impulsa el universo. El Omnissiah, en su misericordia, concedió al mundo el don de la Fuerza Motriz, y nosotros seguimos sus impulsos para aumentarla, acercarla a los profanos y protegerla de manos impías».
languages.original_text: "We have devoted ourselves to the worship of that aspect of the Machine God which is known as the Motive Force. It is the blessed divine spark that creates impetus in the universe. The Omnissiah, in his mercy, gave the world the gift of the Motive Force, and we follow its impulses in order to increase it, bring it to laypeople, and protect it from unholy hands."

traits.locale_text: «Nos hemos consagrado al culto de ese aspecto del Dios Máquina que se conoce como la Fuerza Motriz. Es una chispa divina bendita que crea una dinámica en el universo. El Omnissiah, en su misericordia, concedió al mundo el don de la Fuerza Motriz, y nosotros seguimos sus impulsos para aumentarla, acercarla a los profanos y protegerla de manos impías».

languages.text: "Kendimizi Makine Tanrı'nın Devinim Gücü olarak bilinen çehresine tapınmaya adadık. O ki evrendeki enerjiyi yaratan kutsanmış ilahi kıvılcımdır. Merhametli Hermesih, dünyaya Devinim Gücü armağanını bahşetti. Biz de onu artırabilmek, avama yayabilmek ve şer odaklarından koruyabilmek adına impulslarını takip ediyoruz."
languages.original_text: "We have devoted ourselves to the worship of that aspect of the Machine God which is known as the Motive Force. It is the blessed divine spark that creates impetus in the universe. The Omnissiah, in his mercy, gave the world the gift of the Motive Force, and we follow its impulses in order to increase it, bring it to laypeople, and protect it from unholy hands."

traits.locale_text: "Kendimizi Makine Tanrı'nın Devinim Gücü olarak bilinen çehresine tapınmaya adadık. O ki evrendeki enerjiyi yaratan kutsanmış ilahi kıvılcımdır. Merhametli Hermesih, dünyaya Devinim Gücü armağanını bahşetti; biz de onu artırabilmek, avama yayabilmek ve kötücül ellerden koruyabilmek adına tepkilerini takip ediyoruz."
